issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly macOS wheel builds fail (brew bundle edition)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7922](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7922). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See e.g. https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/653768373#L129. Apparently a new Homebrew release changed some dependency of `brew bundle` so we need to be sure to `brew update` first: https://travis-ci.community/t/macos-build-fails-because-of-homebrew-bundle-unknown-command/7296/6.
